item.title: [BHS/ERI/LIM/SBG/WAW/RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Licensing
item.description:
Jun 7, 15:51 UTC
Update - Renewal are on going with our partner.
Our teams are working on the issue.
Update will be post has significant progress is made.

Jun 2, 08:49 UTC
Identified - Start time: 01/06/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : We are in the process of renewing the Veeam licensing, but due to some issues, we entered into a Grace Period.
You may experience some issues to get new licenses from our Veeam Enterprise offer, and messages speaking about Grace Period.
This isnâ€™t impacting our Managed Veeam Backup offer.
Ongoing Actions: We are working the renewal with our partner, we expect to receive the new license in the following days.
Root cause: : Current license entered into Grace Period.

Apr 26, 21:59 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/05/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 26/05/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere and Zerto will be inaccessible for 3 hours during the maintenance. Hosts will be rebooted, but there is no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service

item.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage incident notification
item.description:
May 25, 04:58 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/05/2023 22:00 UTC
End Time : 24/05/2023 04:35 UTC
Root cause : Incident caused by difficulties encountered on this: maintenance
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 24, 23:56 UTC
Identified - Start time: 24/05/2023 22:00 UTC
User impact : Due to difficulties encountered during operations on this ongoing : maintenance,
the back up on one of the concerned servers is temporary unavailable.
Root cause : Incident caused by difficulties encountered on this: maintenance
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on it to restore the service.

item.title: [RBX2b][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage cluster issue
item.description:
May 24, 10:05 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/05/2023 07:34 UTC
End Time : 24/05/2023 09:45 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a disconnection of network cards.

May 24, 08:21 UTC
Investigating - Please note the incident on Cluster117 PCC

Following all the necessary information.

Start time: 24/05/2023 07:34 UTC
User impact : The cluster117 is unavailable.
Affected assets :
ssd-016720
ssd-016692
ssd-016351
ssd-016615
ssd-016555
ssd-016577
ssd-016719
ssd-016384
ssd-017482
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2b
Ongoing Actions: Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Thank you for your understanding

OVHcloud Technical team
